channel.title: Reading Stuff
channel.description: Interesting stuff to read (okay and sometimes also to watch or listen ;-) found on the Internet.

item.title: DevOps: Don't destroy silos, transform them
item.description: "Destroying silos" is a clumsy solution to team isolation.

item.title: The Absolute Minimum Every Software Developer Must Know About Unicode in 2023 (Still No Excuses!)
item.description: Twenty years after Joel Spolsky's article a lot changed but UTF still has it's surprises.

item.title: Why are process gates the hellish spawn of evil you should avoid at all cost?
item.description: A common leadership mistake is process gates. What are process gates?

item.title: (Almost) Every infrastructure decision I endorse or regret after 4 years running infrastructure at a startup
item.description: This post lists some of the major decisions made.
